title: You can now fundraise for over a million NGOs through Instagram Reels
content:
In an unbalanced world where some are bound to be unfortunate, every little gesture of help matters. Despite individualism taking over more and more societies, one must not forget the human in each and every one of us. Fundraising tools have been around for many years. They come with different approaches, policies, and aims. However,

The post You can now fundraise for over a million NGOs through Instagram Reels appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Instagram now support fundraising for over 1.5 million nonprofit organizations in more than 30 countries through its Reels feature.
